org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.mailbox

Interface Inbox

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomicInbox, NonBlockingInbox

    public interface Inbox
    Provides at least two queues for a mailbox's incoming messages, where the first queue is a concurrent linked queue for messages passed from other mailboxes and the other(s) are local queues for messages that are passed using the mailbox's own thread.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int INITIAL_LOCAL_QUEUE_SIZE
      Default initial local queue size.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasWork()
      Returns true when there is a message in the inbox that can be processed.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true when all the queues are empty.
      boolean isIdle()
      Returns true when the inbox is empty and no request messages are being processed atomically.
      void offer(boolean _local, Message _msg)
      Inserts a new message in the queue.
      void offer(java.util.Queue<Message> _msgs)
      Thread-safe message insertion.
      Message poll()
      Retrieves and removes from the inbox the next message to be processed, or returns null if there are no messages that can be processed.
      void requestBegin()
      Signals the start of a request.
      void requestEnd()
      Signals that the result of a request has been assigned.

    • Field Detail

      • INITIAL_LOCAL_QUEUE_SIZE

        static final int INITIAL_LOCAL_QUEUE_SIZE
        Default initial local queue size.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • hasWork

        boolean hasWork()
        Returns true when there is a message in the inbox that can be processed. (This method is not thread safe and must be called on the mailbox's thread.)
        Returns:
        True if there is a message in the inbox that can be processed.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true when all the queues are empty.
        Returns:
        True when all the queues are empty.

      • isIdle

        boolean isIdle()
        Returns true when the inbox is empty and no request messages are being processed atomically.
        Returns:
        True when there is no work pending.

      • offer

        void offer(boolean _local,
         Message _msg)
        Inserts a new message in the queue.
        Parameters:
        _local - True when the message is being inserted using the mailbox's own thread.
        _msg - The new message.

      • offer

        void offer(java.util.Queue<Message> _msgs)
        Thread-safe message insertion.
        Parameters:
        _msgs - The new messages.

      • poll

        Message poll()
        Retrieves and removes from the inbox the next message to be processed, or returns null if there are no messages that can be processed.
        Returns:
        The next message to be processed, or null if there are no messages to be processed.

      • requestBegin

        void requestBegin()
        Signals the start of a request.

      • requestEnd

        void requestEnd()
        Signals that the result of a request has been assigned.
